name: Ant Farm Simulator
description:
Ant Farm (formicarium) With A Colony Of Ants.

Ants have artificial intelligence that mimics the full life cycle, behavior, nature and physics of real insects.
You need to take care of your ant colony, feed it, keep it hydrated, and clean up the trash.
The colony continues to develop even when the game is not running.
The game-simulator is constantly updated, adding different types of ants, new ant care modes, other types of food, new forms of formicaria and much more.
